1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ???? with a chance of ????.
1�Close observation of the sky reveals that the weather in this area today will be ???? with occasional ????. There is also a slight chance of ????, so caution is in order.

1�Oh... Verena...
1�Nobody... Verena... Don't hate...them...
1�Verena... Don't cry...
1�Something else...
1�Thank...you...
1�Fickblix?What happened? Are you all right?
1�What has happened here?Who did this to you? Tell me who!
1�I know! I know! Hate will get us nowhere.
1�I understand how you feel. If only we all could. Then...then there'd be no more fighting.
1�It's okay, Fickblix. You don't have to worry. I'll be...I'll be all right.
1�Shhh. Your courage needs no words. Even now I can feel the warmth of your heart. Just...just hang in there.
1�Yes, Fickie, what is it?
1�No, Fickie. Thank you. You've shown us our mistakes.
1�Fickblix always told us that someday people and beastmen would get along.
1�I suppose you'll keep on hating them. No, not just hating, actually fighting them.
1�But just remember this one thing. Some beastmen think like Fickblix did.
1�There's more to life than what you see in front of you. We are all flowing on the river of life, not just watching from the banks.
1�What now?(Empty)Event(Empty)WarpWent out of ZoneFlag Reset
1�Are you uneasy, Your Holiness?
1�Place your trust in me, Your Holiness. Windurst shall escape its fate of ruin.
1�The Book of the Gods has taught me everything.
1�What happened? Are you all right?
1�What could they possibly want with it?
1�What the...
1�Then it is true.The beastmen are trying to bring the Shadow Lord back.
1�You be careful, too.
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Magicite(pt.1).Magicite(pt.2).Magicite(pt.3).A Moral Manifest?(pt.1).A Moral Manifest?(pt.2).A Moral Manifest?(pt.3).A Moral Manifest?(pt.4).A Moral Manifest?(pt.5).A Moral Manifest?(pt.6).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�Ahhh! Adventurer!How long have you been standing there!? You heard nothing, right? You hear something, Hooknox cut out your tongue and feed it to pet coeurl, Miffie.
1�Hah hah hah! Just kidding! Coeurl's name is Brutus, not Miffie.Hah hah hah! Just kidding! Hooknox won't hurt you.
1�I'm adventurer, just like you...only lot cuter! You can call me Nox if Hooknox is too hard to pronounce with that funny-shaped mouth of yours.

1�Eh? What is Hooknox doing here?Well, I guess I can tell you... Just last week, yours truly got her hands on some juicy info about huge shipment of riches sent to head honcho of this place from some bigwig in East.
1�Hey, we've all heard stories of Eastern Empire's solid jade futons, ruby chandeliers, and gold-laden chamber pots. And I'd bet my baby Brutus's collar that this Yagudo treasure is just as tasty!

1�So, I rushed down to local auction house and bought all Yagudo feathers on sale. Then I use Old Muckvix's world-famous super-adhesive animal glue (now safe for children!) to stick all feathers to Hooknox's pretty figure. I looked just like one of those overgrown crows...or is that undergrown chocobos?

1�Anyway, Hooknox made it in here, no sweat. But once I got in...that's when I started to sweat. And that's when Yagudo disguise started getting all itchy and scratchy. Hooknox couldn't take it anymore, so I ripped off feathers and...and that's when adventurer walked in.

1�So, what do you say? Feel like teaming up with cute Gobbie on quest for fame and riches?What? You don't feel good about stealing from crazy Yagudo? But just think of consequences. If Yagudo sell treasure, they get gil to buy sharp knives and pointy swords--then they take knives and swords and use them to poke out your eyes while you sleep!
1�Hmph...Then I guess I'll just have to spend all those riches myself!
1�Heh heh... Spoken like true sucker...Huh? You didn't hear that, right? Brutus! Brutus!
1�Ahem! Here's plan...You sneak into Yagudo head honcho treasure vault. Then, you steal treasure.

1�Get all that?Oh yeah, there's tricky lock on giant stone coffer, but yours truly already swiped key!Hm? How'd Hooknox manage that? Well, after I scaled 5000-yalm cliff and fought off army of bloodsucking...

1�Wait! First things first.Now, once you get treasure, you come straight back here. If treasure is gold and jewels, Hooknox keep and give you half its value in gil. If treasure is super weapon, you keep and give me half its value in gil.
1�Oh well, I'll send you postcard from summer home I buy on Purgonorgo Isle! Adios!
1�Alright! Now let's get mov...Ummm... You're not thinking of waltzing into head honcho's private quarters looking like that, are you?
1�You need disguise, just like Hooknox's (only maybe not as scratchy).
1�I know! Why not ask funny Tarutaru lady at Weavemeister Guild in Windurst?
1�Hooknox will wait for you here, but hurry up! We wouldn't want some other Gobbie putting her grimy hands on my...our treasure!
1�It's about time! Didn't your mother tell you it's rude to keep lady waiting?
1�?[.........?/Wait, you're lady, too! Hooknox couldn't tell with that thing on your.........]
1�Wah hah hah hah! Nice hat! Hooknox loves funny jokes. Let Hooknox tell next one.Moblin, Orc, and gigantobugard walk into Steaming Sheep Restaurant...
1�I know it doesn't look much like key, but trust me, it'll work!
1�Now get going!I'll be guarding entrance to make sure Yagudo don't try to sneak treasure out.
1�What? It could happen!
1�That took long enough! What were you doing in there, having cup of San d'Orian tea with Manifest?Anyway, where's riches?
1�Eh? Eh? I didn't catch that..........Eh? Eh? I didn't catch th...
1�No riches!?No riches!?You're pulling Hooknox's ear now, aren't you?You're not... Oh...
1�Thanks for holding up your end of bargain.
1�What are you so surprised at? We Gobbies believe in stuff like honor, justice...even ?[love/friendship]... Sometimes...
1�But if we do meet up in some dungeon somewhere...do you think you'd want to team up again? For old times' sake?Think about it!

1�Ah, one of Altana's children...You come into my sacred abode, steal my treasures, fell my loyal servants...Now here you stand, a quivering fool in the presence of the almighty. Is there something you wish to say before I tear your heart from your chest and drink the blood from its chambers?
1�An amusing tale...I see you know little of the grave situation that currently faces the heretics of the East.

1�However, I cannot have foolish rumors staining the reputation of the Theomilitary. While my instincts advise against it, I will enlighten you unto our current state of affairs so you may rightfully inform those who may doubt the motives of Tzee Xicu the almighty.

1�For many generations, the Yagudo have had peaceful relations with the Empire of the East. There have even been men among our ranks who crossed the vast oceans and have chosen to serve under the foreign emperor.
1�It was one of these men, now a messenger for the Empire, who sought my audience not more than a few moons ago. He bore an urgent missive--a request for help, signed by the emperor himself.

1�It seems that the Empire is under attack. A recent decaying of the land caused by an unknown phenomenon has left the nation in ruin and devastated the spirits of its people. The hostile tribes that make their homes on the Empire's borders have sensed this weakness, and have chosen to take advantage of it by launching a series of offensives.

1�After reading forth the message, my Yagudo son presented me with an ornate blade forged by the Empire's finest craftsman and begged that I send reinforcements to aid the emperor in his current predicament.

1�While it pains me to turn my back on one of my children, the Theomilitary's situation on Mindartia prevented me from providing the service of any more than a handful of loyal men. This most certainly did not warrant the acceptance of such a fine offering, so I sent the messenger back to his leader carrying the blade he brought with him...and my deepest apologies.
1�So now do you see? There is no treasure in my vaults. There never was.
1�However, I must commend you on your stealth and ingenuity for making it this deep into my lair. You are a fine warrior, and for that I will spare your insignificant life.
1�I shall even offer you a token of admiration. Place that headpiece you carry on the stone tile and I will grant it my blessing.
1�Trust in thine enemy... You children of Altana do not cease to amaze me. You would make a fine member of the Theomilitary.
1�Tsoo Haja the Umbra. From this day forth, you are to serve this adventurer as you would serve me.
1�Do you defy my will, Tsoo Haja!? Or perhaps you think you are more powerful than the almighty Tzee Xicu!?

1�If ?[he/she] were to order you to attack me?Insolent fool! I am Tzee Xicu the Manifest! Even if my blood were to spill upon the red sands of Aragoneu, the flame of my immortal soul would only burn brighter.
1�Let me return your headpiece.
1�You may use it to call forth Tsoo Haja.While quite stubborn at times, he is one of my most skilled ninjas. He will serve you loyally for as long as I request it.
1�Now begone from my citadel, child of Altana.

1�Inform the world that there is no hidden treasure in my vaults, but tell no one of our meeting. And remember that Tzee Xicu the Manifest will not be so forgiving the next time a heretic sets foot on this holy soil.
1�You called, my lord.
1�Kwakwah! But my lord, ?[he/she] is a filthy heretic...
1�No, my lord! My apologies...However, what if ?[he/she] were to ask me to...
1�Yes, my lord!
1�Come on, it'll be fun!Alright! I'm in!I'll wear goggles to bed.
1�Sound fair?Fair enough!I need to talk to my manager.
